sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a trapezium.
message_1: A trapezium has a base of 8cm, top length of 12cm and two non-parallel sides of 10cm and 6cm. What is the perimeter of the trapezium?
message_2:
To find the perimeter of the trapezium, we simply need to add up the lengths of all four sides.

Perimeter = base + top + left side + right side
Perimeter = 8 cm + 12 cm + 10 cm + 6 cm
Perimeter = 36 cm

The perimeter of the trapezium is 36 cm.
